name: Manna 2.0
tagline: Duolingo for bible study ‚Äî now with a study pet! üêë
description: Introducing the ‚Äã‚ÄãBible study pet companion ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äî a gentle lamb that grows with you as you grow your faith. Bible Chat 2.0 offers deeper and faster scriptural understanding. Now worldwide believers can join on iOS and Android ‚Äî and in German, French and Spanish.

name: Video Marketer by Memories.ai
tagline: Perplexity for videos, #1 research tool for video marketing
description: Video Marketer by Memories.ai is perplexity for videos. It helps brands, marketers, and creators unlock social video insights. Instantly find influencers, analyze why videos go viral, and predict trends - powered by the world‚Äôs first large visual memory model.

name: Sprinto's AI Security Questionnaire
tagline: AI that answers Security Questionnaires & RFP like you would
description: Sprinto‚Äôs AI Security Questionnaire turns hours of manual work into minutes. Import any file, in any language, and get accurate, ready-to-share answers powered by a trained knowledge base.

name: Conduit AI
tagline: Unified inbox & workflows for conversational AI agents
description: Conduit is the platform for building, training, and iterating on conversational AI agents. It unifies business communication in a single inbox where agents not only respond but continually improve. Agents operate across calls, email, SMS, and chat.

name: Loop MCP by SimpliflowAI
tagline: The tools Appstore for your AI
description: Connect all your apps to any AI assistant with seamless integration. Loop is your unified MCP gateway that allows you to connect to tools & MCP servers while solving the tools limit problem in AI apps

name: Modul
tagline: A tool to create good-looking presentations quickly
description: Creating presentations is time-consuming and requires design skills. Modul makes it easy with unbreakable layouts and styles. Customize colors, fonts, and themes with a few clicks, while content automatically fits any layout, keeping everything polished.

name: Mixboard
tagline: A new way to visualize your ideas
description: Mixboard is a new experimental AI-powered concepting board from Google Labs. It lets you start with a simple prompt, generate and edit images with natural language, and visually explore your ideas on an open canvas.

name: Qudemo
tagline: Make your demo videos Interactive using AI
description: Qudemo is an AI video assistant that makes demo videos interactive. Viewers can ask questions, get instant answers and jump to the exact moment in the video where the answer is explained, turning demos into real conversations.

name: Kling 2.5 Turbo
tagline: Next-Level Creativity, Turbocharged
description: Redefining the Best: Significant upgrade in stability & creativity, video quality pushed to the next level. More reasonable Price: Now 30% lower to fuel your creativity.

name: GroupTab
tagline: Grouped App Switcher for macOS
description: GroupTab enhances app switching on macOS. Arrange running apps into labeled, row‚Äëbased groups, cycle through each group as usual, or hop between groups to keep context and cut clutter.

name: Grapevine
tagline: A company GPT that actually works
description: Connects to all your company's data sources, e.g. Slack, GDrive, Codebase, Linear, etc., and makes it really easy for AI agents to search over. The first product we're launching on this system is a company GPT that works better than any alternative today.

name: Visuals
tagline: Upload your data and let AI generate charts in seconds
description: Transform data into beautiful visualizations. Upload your data and let AI generate charts in seconds. Export your customized visualization for use in your projects.

name: ReFeed
tagline: Your smart news agent that create your customized Newsfeed
description: Liberate your feed from clutter and algorithms, Refeed is just the news that matters for you. Refeed cuts through noise: one simple customized daily feed of essential stories from trusted media sources according to your Interests, refreshed for your focus.

name: Voibe
tagline: The only dictation app that understands developers
description: Voibe is the fastest dictation app for mac, built for developers. With deep Cursor integration, it resolves files and folders correctly when you speak them out. It‚Äôs accurate, private, and works in all apps. Still vibe coding? Start voibe coding.

name: Asa.Team
tagline: Your All In One Workplace Tool
description: AI-powered workplace assistant for remote & hybrid teams. Features Kanban boards, mood tracking, automated workflows, and seamless clock-in across Teams/Telegram. Perfect for HR managers and team leaders. Get started free!

name: LyRuno
tagline: Free & Powerful AI Audio Separator - Vocal Remover
description: LyRuno Free & Powerful AI Audio Separator. Extract vocals, instruments, and accompaniment from songs, or isolate dialogue, music, and SFX from videos‚Äîpowered by world-leading AI for studio-quality audio separation.

name: Hashbuzz
tagline: Turning attention into shared value
description: Hashbuzz is a SocialFi network that plugs into the social apps you use. It verifies real engagement and turns it into rewards for you and lasting value for your community, giving brands transparent results without replacing your favorite platforms.

name: SaaS Ranking
tagline: Find the best software for your needs. The G2 killer.
description: Saas-ranking.ai, the first unbiased software ranking built like real buyers decide. We analyze features case studies, reviews across Reddit + Twitter, and brand credibility, to give you the best tools tailored to your business.

name: Domain Brainstorm
tagline: Find great names not taken
description: ChatGPT + Whois = DomainBrainstorm.io! This helps you find great product names with a decent domain still available. You enter what your product does or a name you like, and get back a list of brand names and available domain names around it.

name: LogoKit
tagline: Logo and company data API for domains, stocks, ETFs & more
description: Add high-quality logos for brands, domains, stocks, ETFs, and crypto to your app or website with just one line of code. Or use our Brand Data API for up-to-date data and visual assets for any company globally to create professional, on-brand designs at scale.
